title: FundKrypt â€“ Crowdfunding dApp
description: A decentralized crowdfunding platform built with Solidity, Next.js, and TailwindCSS. Users can create campaigns and donate via smart contracts.

title: Raffle Contract
description: A decentralized raffle system built with Solidity and Foundry. It leverages Chainlink VRF v2 for provably fair randomness and Chainlink Automation to manage upkeep. Includes full deployment and subscription management scripts for Sepolia and local Anvil testing.
